statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); short_pwd="${cwd/#$HOME/\~}"; if [[ ${#short_pwd} -gt 40 ]]; then base=$(basename "$cwd"); parent=$(dirname "$cwd"); parent_short="${parent/#$HOME/\~}"; if [[ ${#parent_short} -gt 30 ]]; then short_pwd=".../${parent_short##*/}/$base"; else short_pwd="$parent_short/$base"; fi; fi; git_info=""; if git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then if git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then status="✔"; status_color="32"; else status="✗"; status_color="31"; fi; git_info=$(printf " \033[34m%s\033[0m \033[%sm%s\033[0m" "$branch" "$status_color" "$status"); fi; fi; printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m»\033[0m%s" "$short_pwd" "$git_info"
